Episodes.Title: Postman Pat and the Runaway Kite
Episodes.Plot: It's a very windy day in Greendale and Ajay has organized a kite flying festival.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat and the Hungry Goat
Episodes.Plot: Dorothy and Alf Thompson's naughty goat has eaten the labels off Pat's parcels.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat and the Ice Cream Machine
Episodes.Plot: It's a hot day in Greendale and Ted Glen has invented a special ice-cream machine, but it must be repaired in time for the picnic.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat And The Great Greendale Race
Episodes.Plot: The villagers decide to hold a race to decide whose vehicle is best.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat and the Jumble Sale
Episodes.Plot: It's National Recycling Week and the villagers are holding a jumble sale.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat the Magician
Episodes.Plot: Charlie and Julian are holding auditions for their new band in the village hall. Pat agrees to be their manager and looks for potential candidates on his rounds.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat And The Spotty Situation
Episodes.Plot: Chicken Pox is sweeping Greendale and Pat is kept busy delivering get-well gifts.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat and the Greendale Movie
Episodes.Plot: Pat takes delivery of his new video camera and makes a Greendale Video Diary.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat Goes Football Crazy
Episodes.Plot: Today the village's five aside football match is being held on the Green and having to do his mail rounds on his bicycle proves to be the perfect form of training of Pat.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat's Pigeon Post
Episodes.Plot: Pat offers to take Alf's racing pigeon Cederic to the vets in Pencaster but his van runs out of petrol. Will anyone be able to find Pat?

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat and a Job Well Done
Episodes.Plot: Julian is to give a class talk about peoples' jobs so Pat takes him on his round to find out while Ted varnishes the schoolroom floor.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat and the Green Rabbit
Episodes.Plot: Pat offers to babysit Nikhil during his round while Julian goes with Ajay, Nisha and Meera to the cinema in Pencaster. Nikhil can't sleep without his green rabbit toy.

Episodes.Title: Postman Pat and the Big Butterflies
Episodes.Plot: Two escaped butterflies from Pencaster Zoo go on the loose in Greendale. Whoever catches them will get free tickets to the zoo so the children try to catch them.
